channel.title: internet cafe on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in internet cafe on Barefoot Rob

item.title: cafe kips
item.description: 12:01 Wednesday 19 December 2018 JST For over a year, I have had gaps in my schedule on Wednesdays between teaching at Solid Square in Kawasaki and teaching at JB in Kawsaki. Usually I bring my computer and work in a cafe, but today is the second time I have worked in an internet cafe, which features my own private space with a padded floor for sleeping, free wifi, free shower, free drinks, and free ice cream.
